commit.message:
Sequence-based id generation for SyncopeRole

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/syncope/trunk@1246714 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

files.patch:
@@ -31,6 +31,15 @@
         </attributes>
     </entity>
 
+    <entity class="org.syncope.core.persistence.beans.role.SyncopeRole">
+        <attributes>
+            <id name="id">
+                <generated-value generator="SEQ_SyncopeRole" strategy="TABLE"/>
+                <table-generator name="SEQ_SyncopeRole" pk-column-value="SEQ_SyncopeRole" initial-value="10"/>
+            </id>
+        </attributes>
+    </entity>
+    
     <entity class="org.syncope.core.persistence.beans.SchemaMapping">
         <attributes>
             <id name="id">

@@ -31,6 +31,15 @@
         </attributes>
     </entity>
 
+    <entity class="org.syncope.core.persistence.beans.role.SyncopeRole">
+        <attributes>
+            <id name="id">
+                <generated-value generator="SEQ_SyncopeRole" strategy="TABLE"/>
+                <table-generator name="SEQ_SyncopeRole" pk-column-value="SEQ_SyncopeRole" initial-value="10"/>
+            </id>
+        </attributes>
+    </entity>
+    
     <entity class="org.syncope.core.persistence.beans.SchemaMapping">
         <attributes>
             <id name="id">

@@ -18,6 +18,7 @@
     so since SyncopeUser.id@TableGenerator.allocationSize == 100, actual
     starting value for SyncopeUser.id is 1000 -->
     <hibernate_sequences sequence_name="SEQ_SyncopeUser" sequence_next_hi_value="10"/>
+    <hibernate_sequences sequence_name="SEQ_SyncopeRole" sequence_next_hi_value="10"/>
     <hibernate_sequences sequence_name="SEQ_SchemaMapping" sequence_next_hi_value="10"/>
     <hibernate_sequences sequence_name="SEQ_ConnectorInstance" sequence_next_hi_value="10"/>
     <hibernate_sequences sequence_name="SEQ_UAttr" sequence_next_hi_value="1000"/>

@@ -18,6 +18,7 @@
     so since SyncopeUser.id@TableGenerator.allocationSize == 100, actual
     starting value for SyncopeUser.id is 1000 -->
     <hibernate_sequences sequence_name="SEQ_SyncopeUser" sequence_next_hi_value="10"/>
+    <hibernate_sequences sequence_name="SEQ_SyncopeRole" sequence_next_hi_value="10"/>
     <hibernate_sequences sequence_name="SEQ_SchemaMapping" sequence_next_hi_value="10"/>
     <hibernate_sequences sequence_name="SEQ_ConnectorInstance" sequence_next_hi_value="10"/>
     <hibernate_sequences sequence_name="SEQ_UAttr" sequence_next_hi_value="1000"/>
